command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user aVmfAzGaFwUYThZ.5c3d77929c0b --database mF7Zux5nFuxUoJfuPYEPAJ --execute SELECT * FROM complianceSections LIMIT 25

rows.description: Ensuring person-centred care, dignity, respect, and involvement in decision-making
rows.tooltip: This section covers how well you respect service users' choices, preferences, and dignity. Focus on person-centred care practices, communication, and involvement in care planning.

rows.description: Obtaining and documenting valid consent, understanding MCA and DoLS
rows.tooltip: Assess how consent is obtained and recorded. Check understanding of Mental Capacity Act (MCA), Deprivation of Liberty Safeguards (DoLS), and Lasting Power of Attorney (LPA).

rows.description: Comprehensive care planning, holistic support, and meeting individual needs
rows.tooltip: Review care plans for comprehensiveness, person-centredness, and regular reviews. Ensure all aspects of wellbeing are addressed.

rows.description: Providing adequate nutrition, hydration, and dietary support
rows.tooltip: Check food quality, choice, hydration monitoring, dietary requirements, and nutritional risk assessments.

rows.description: Working effectively with other healthcare and social care providers
rows.tooltip: Assess collabouration with GPs, hospitals, social workers, and other services. Check Memorandums of Understanding (MoU) and information sharing.

rows.description: Protecting service users from abuse, harm, and neglect
rows.tooltip: Review safeguarding policies, incident reporting, staff training, and protection procedures. Ensure all concerns are properly reported and investigated.

rows.description: Preventing and controlling infections through proper hygiene and procedures
rows.tooltip: Check hand hygiene, PPE usage, cleaning schedules, waste disposal, and infection control policies. Review outbreak management procedures.

rows.description: Safe ordering, storage, administration, and disposal of medications
rows.tooltip: Audit medication administration records (MAR), storage conditions, staff competency, and medication errors. Check PRN protocols and controlled drugs management.

rows.description: Maintaining safe, accessible, and suitable premises
rows.tooltip: Assess building safety, fire safety, accessibility, maintenance, and environmental risk assessments. Check compliance with health and safety regulations.

rows.description: Ensuring all equipment is safe, maintained, and fit for purpose
rows.tooltip: Review equipment maintenance records, PAT testing, servicing schedules, and safe usage. Check hoists, beds, wheelchairs, and medical devices.

rows.description: Regular audits, quality assurance, and continuous improvement
rows.tooltip: Review audit schedules, action plans, quality improvement initiatives, and management oversight. Check how feedback is used to improve services.

rows.description: Handling complaints effectively and learning from feedback
rows.tooltip: Audit complaints log, response times, investigation quality, and lessons learned. Ensure accessible complaints procedures.

rows.description: Maintaining accurate, secure, and accessible records
rows.tooltip: Check record-keeping standards, data protection compliance, storage security, and accessibility. Review care plans, daily notes, and incident records.

rows.description: Managing service user finances safely and transparently
rows.tooltip: Audit financial records, receipts, authorizations, and safeguarding of service user money. Check policies and procedures for handling finances.

rows.description: Providing meaningful activities and social engagement
rows.tooltip: Review activity programs, individual preferences, participation records, and community involvement. Ensure activities promote wellbeing and independence.

rows.description: Providing dignified, compassionate end of life care
rows.tooltip: Check advance care planning, pain management, family involvement, and dignity in dying. Review staff training and support.

rows.description: Supporting mental health and emotional wellbeing
rows.tooltip: Assess mental health assessments, support plans, access to specialist services, and staff awareness. Check for person-centred mental health care.

rows.description: Promoting equality, respecting diversity, and preventing discrimination
rows.tooltip: Review policies, staff training, and practices around protected characteristics. Ensure inclusive care that respects cultural, religious, and personal preferences.

rows.description: Effective leadership, governance structures, and accountability
rows.tooltip: Assess management oversight, governance meetings, accountability frameworks, and leadership quality. Check registered manager presence and oversight.

rows.description: Safe recruitment practices and pre-employment checks
rows.tooltip: Ensure all staff have completed DBS checks, references, identity verification, right to work checks, and professional registration checks where applicable.

rows.description: Comprehensive induction and onboarding for new staff
rows.tooltip: Check induction programs cover Care Certificate standards, policies, procedures, and shadowing. Ensure new staff are competent before working unsupervised.

rows.description: Ongoing training and professional development
rows.tooltip: Audit mandatory training compliance (safeguarding, infection control, medication, moving and handling, etc.) and specialist training needs. Check training matrix and certificates.

rows.description: Regular supervision, appraisal, and performance management
rows.tooltip: Review supervision frequency (minimum every 6-8 weeks), quality of supervision records, annual appraisals, and personal development plans.

rows.description: Competency assessments and observational checks
rows.tooltip: Check competency assessments for medication, moving and handling, and other key tasks. Review spot checks and observational audits of practice.

rows.description: Supporting staff health, wellbeing, and fitness to practice
rows.tooltip: Review occupational health assessments, sickness absence management, stress risk assessments, and wellbeing support offered to staff.

stdout:
